description: Justin Hughes admitted going to a GP's surgery after returning to the Isle of Man from Thailand.
title: Coronavirus: Man who visited GP's surgery while self-isolating jailed
title_page: Coronavirus: Man who visited GP's surgery while self-isolating jailed - BBC News
maintext: He only left after police were called and was arrested shortly after on Bowring Road, later admitting to officers he had also visited a shop to buy food as there was "nothing in" at his address.
